name: devstefancho-claude-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins marketplace for code style review and SDD workflow

plugins.name: code-style-plugin
plugins.description: AI code review plugin based on code style principles - checks SRP (Single Responsibility Principle), DRY, Simplicity First, YAGNI, and Type Safety

plugins.name: code-quality-plugin
plugins.description: Code quality review skill focusing on DRY, KISS, and Clean Code principles for comprehensive code assessment

plugins.name: simple-sdd-plugin
plugins.description: Simple SDD workflow commands for generating specifications, plans, tasks, and implementations

plugins.name: common-mcp-plugin
plugins.description: Common MCP servers for shared tools and integrations (chrome-devtools, etc)

plugins.name: scaffold-claude-feature
plugins.description: Generate Claude Code features (slash commands, skills, subagents, hooks, output styles) with proper structure

plugins.name: git-worktree-plugin
plugins.description: Manage git worktrees for parallel branch work with proactive suggestions

plugins.name: session-reporter-plugin
plugins.description: Generate HTML reports to visualize work sessions with conversation history and code changes

plugins.name: spec-manager-plugin
plugins.description: Manage specification files for spec-driven development workflow

plugins.name: git-commit-plugin
plugins.description: Auto-generate conventional commit messages in Korean by analyzing changes

plugins.name: pr-create-plugin
plugins.description: Create GitHub pull requests with auto-generated title and description

plugins.name: stop-notification-plugin
plugins.description: macOS TTS voice notification with modal dialog and tmux navigation when Claude stops or needs attention

plugins.name: worktrace-plugin
plugins.description: Extract Claude Code work history and generate daily summaries grouped by project and ticket

plugins.name: frontend-plugin
plugins.description: React.js 프론트엔드 개발을 위한 코드 리뷰 및 설계 원칙 검사 플러그인

plugins.name: smart-commit-plugin
plugins.description: Analyze Claude Code session history to split uncommitted changes into logical commits

plugins.name: test-commit-push-pr-clean-plugin
plugins.description: Automates lint, test, commit, push, PR creation, and worktree cleanup workflow

plugins.name: local-test-plugin
plugins.description: Symlink-based local plugin testing for development workflow
